accountActivation.emailRegistered: Your email address has just been registered with Gradido.
accountActivation.pleaseClickLink: Please click here to complete the registration and activate your Gradido account.
accountActivation.subject: Email Verification
accountActivation.title: Email Verification

accountMultiRegistration.emailExists: However, an account already exists for your email address.
accountMultiRegistration.emailReused: Your email address has just been used again to register an account with Gradido.
accountMultiRegistration.ifYouAreNotTheOne: If you did not try to register again, please contact our support:
accountMultiRegistration.onForgottenPasswordClickLink: If you have forgotten your password, please click here.
accountMultiRegistration.subject: Try To Register Again With Your Email
accountMultiRegistration.title: Try To Register Again With Your Email

addedContributionMessage.commonGoodContributionMessage: You have received a message from {senderFirstName} {senderLastName} regarding your common good contribution “{contributionMemo}”.
addedContributionMessage.subject: Message about your common good contribution
addedContributionMessage.title: Message about your common good contribution
addedContributionMessage.toSeeAndAnswerMessage: To reply to the message, go to the “Creation” menu in your Gradido account and click on the “My contributions” tab.

contribution.toSeeContributionsAndMessages: To see your common good contributions and related messages, go to the “Creation” menu in your Gradido account and click on the “My contributions” tab.

contributionChangedByModerator.subject: Your common good contribution has been changed
contributionChangedByModerator.text: your common good contribution '{contributionMemo}' has just been changed by {senderFirstName} {senderLastName} and now reads as '{contributionMemoUpdated}'
contributionChangedByModerator.title: Your common good contribution has been changed

contributionConfirmed.commonGoodContributionConfirmed: Your common good contribution “{contributionMemo}” has just been approved by {senderFirstName} {senderLastName}. Your Gradido account has been credited with {amountGDD} GDD.
contributionConfirmed.subject: Your contribution to the common good was confirmed
contributionConfirmed.title: Your contribution to the common good was confirmed

contributionDeleted.commonGoodContributionDeleted: Your common good contribution “{contributionMemo}” was deleted by {senderFirstName} {senderLastName}.
contributionDeleted.subject: Your common good contribution was deleted
contributionDeleted.title: Your common good contribution was deleted

contributionDenied.commonGoodContributionDenied: Your common good contribution “{contributionMemo}” was rejected by {senderFirstName} {senderLastName}.
contributionDenied.subject: Your common good contribution was rejected
contributionDenied.title: Your common good contribution was rejected

general.detailsYouFindOnLinkToYourAccount: You can find transaction details in your Gradido account.
general.linkValidity:
The link has a validity of {hours} hours.
If the validity of the link has already expired, you can have a new link sent to you here.
general.linkValidityWithMinutes:
The link has a validity of {hours} hours and {minutes} minutes.
If the validity of the link has already expired, you can have a new link sent to you here.
general.orCopyLink: Or copy the link into your browser window.
general.pleaseDoNotReply: Please do not reply to this email.

resetPassword.pleaseClickLink: If it was you, please click here.
resetPassword.subject: Reset password
resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.youOrSomeoneResetPassword: You, or someone else, requested a password reset for this account.

transactionReceived.haveReceivedAmountGDDFrom: You have just received {transactionAmount} GDD from {senderFirstName} {senderLastName}
transactionReceived.subject: {senderFirstName} {senderLastName} has sent you {transactionAmount} Gradido
transactionReceived.title: {senderFirstName} {senderLastName} has sent you {transactionAmount} Gradido
